A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie is beyond salvation!  In fact\, there is nothing to salvage. 
I thought the "haters" of this movie were just pedantic fanboys... I was WRONG!  I apologise for my erroneous assumptions. This movie is INDEED a peace of crap!  From the cringe-worthy\, self-aware humour to the debasement of Luke Skywalker. From Porgs and Purple-hair to Rose-Rose Binks. 
I can't even express how BAD this movie is.

Sure\, Phantom Menace wasn't;t great\, but at least they had Darth Maul\, podracers\,  double-bladed lightsabers\, Duel of Fates. 
Last Jedi had literally nothing to redeem it.

Also\, there is no way that the 49% audience rating is real!
